trans-unit.source: Provides a minimal reader of incoming response return values for Web service clients implemented using HTTP but without SOAP.
trans-unit.target: 為使用 HTTP 實作但不具有 SOAP 的 Web 服務用戶端，提供連入回應傳回值的最小讀取器。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.AnyReturnReader> and other classes in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols> namespace support the .NET Framework's implementations of Web services via the HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST operations.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.AnyReturnReader> 類別和其他類別<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols>命名空間支援.NET Framework 實作 Web 服務透過 HTTP GET 和 HTTP POST 作業。

trans-unit.source: Web service writers and readers serialize and deserialize, respectively, between the parameters or return objects of Web methods and the HTTP request or response streams.
trans-unit.target: Web 服務寫入器和讀取序列化和還原序列化，分別參數或 Web 方法的傳回物件之間的 HTTP 要求或回應資料流。

trans-unit.source: Web service writers and readers use HTTP for transport but don't exchange messages using the SOAP standard.
trans-unit.target: Web 服務寫入器和讀取器使用 HTTP 傳輸，但不會交換使用 SOAP 標準的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.AnyReturnReader> class provides a minimal implementation of the interface of the abstract parent class <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MimeReturnReader>.You typically will not need to use <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.AnyReturnReader> directly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.AnyReturnReader>類別會提供最簡單的實作之介面的抽象父類別<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MimeReturnReader>。您通常會不需要使用<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.AnyReturnReader>直接。

trans-unit.source: When the Wsdl.exe tool generates client proxy code according to the HTTP-GET or HTTP-POST implementations, it applies the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpMethodAttribute> to each Web method and by default sets the attribute's <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpMethodAttribute.ReturnFormatter%2A> property to <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.XmlReturnReader>, another class derived from <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MimeReturnReader>.
trans-unit.target: 當 Wsdl.exe 工具產生用戶端 proxy 程式碼，根據 HTTP GET 或 HTTP POST 的實作時，它會套用<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpMethodAttribute>每個 Web 方法和預設設定的屬性<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpMethodAttribute.ReturnFormatter%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.XmlReturnReader>，另一個類別衍生自<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.MimeReturnReader>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.AnyReturnReader" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.AnyReturnReader" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo" /> that indicates the Web method for which the initializer is obtained.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo" />，表示為其取得初始設定式的 Web 方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns the parameter passed to the <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Protocols.AnyReturnReader.Initialize(System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 傳回傳遞至 <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Protocols.AnyReturnReader.Initialize(System.Object)" /> 方法的參數。

trans-unit.source: The parameter passed to the <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Protocols.AnyReturnReader.Initialize(System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞至 <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Protocols.AnyReturnReader.Initialize(System.Object)" /> 方法的參數。

trans-unit.source: An initializer is an object passed as a parameter to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.AnyReturnReader.Initialize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 初始設定式會當做參數傳遞的物件<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.AnyReturnReader.Initialize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.AnyReturnReader> class, the initializer is the instance referred to by the keyword `this`, unless the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo> parameter value has a void return type, in which case the initializer is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.AnyReturnReader>類別初始設定式是關鍵字所參考的執行個體`this`，除非<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo>參數值有 void 的傳回類型，在初始設定式的情況下設定為`null`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.AnyReturnReader.GetInitializer%2A> method is invoked during service initialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.AnyReturnReader.GetInitializer%2A>服務初始化期間叫用方法。

trans-unit.source: Later, at the time a response is processed, the initializer <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.AnyReturnReader> object is passed to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.AnyReturnReader.Initialize%2A> method of another <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.AnyReturnReader> instance.
trans-unit.target: 更新版本中，同時處理回應時，初始設定式<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.AnyReturnReader>物件傳遞至<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.AnyReturnReader.Initialize%2A>另一個方法<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.AnyReturnReader>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The other instance takes the call to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.AnyReturnReader.Read%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 另一個執行個體採用的呼叫<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.AnyReturnReader.Read%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Another instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.AnyReturnReader" /> class, on which the <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Protocols.AnyReturnReader.GetInitializer(System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo)" /> method was previously called.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.AnyReturnReader" /> 類別的另一個執行個體，先前曾在其上呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Web.Services.Protocols.AnyReturnReader.GetInitializer(System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo)" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.AnyReturnReader" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.AnyReturnReader" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.AnyReturnReader.Initialize%2A> method does nothing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.AnyReturnReader.Initialize%2A>方法不會執行任何動作。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked at the time a response is processed.
trans-unit.target: 在處理回應的時間叫用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The input parameter, `initializer`, is another instance of <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.AnyReturnReader>, obtained during client initialization.
trans-unit.target: 輸入的參數、 `initializer`，另一個執行個體的<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.AnyReturnReader>、 用戶端初始化期間取得。

trans-unit.source: A representation of the HTTP response sent by a Web service, containing the output message for an operation.
trans-unit.target: Web 服務所傳送的 HTTP 回應的表示，包含作業的輸出訊息。

trans-unit.source: An output stream whose content is the body of the HTTP response represented by the <c>response</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 輸出資料流，其內容為 <c>response</c> 參數所表示的 HTTP 回應主體。

trans-unit.source: Returns the input HTTP response stream.
trans-unit.target: 傳回輸入 HTTP 回應資料流。

trans-unit.source: The input HTTP response stream.
trans-unit.target: 輸入 HTTP 回應資料流。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.AnyReturnReader> class's implementation of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.AnyReturnReader.Read%2A> method does no reading.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.AnyReturnReader>類別的實作<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.AnyReturnReader.Read%2A>方法不會沒有讀取。

trans-unit.source: Instead it simply returns the <xref:System.IO.Stream> object passed as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 而是它只會傳回<xref:System.IO.Stream>做為參數傳遞的物件。
